sentences.en: A pane of glass got broken.
A selection in this pane populates the lower - right pane with detail or document content.
sentences.cn: 选择总览窗格中的对象,右下窗格中出现相应的细节或文件内容.

sentences.en: Chueh - hui tapped lightly on the small pane of glass in the centre of the window.
sentences.cn: 觉慧 忘了自己地把手指放在窗户中间那块小玻璃上轻轻敲了几下.

sentences.en: He broke this pane of glass.
His breath steamed up the window pane.
sentences.cn: 他呼出的气使窗玻璃蒙上一层水汽.

sentences.en: I hurried on, suppressing a savage urge to push my fist through the pane.
sentences.cn: 我按捺住要伸手砸掉橱窗的强烈的冲动,匆匆往前走去.

sentences.en: I saw it through the window pane.
sentences.cn: 透过玻璃窗我看到了它.

sentences.en: Note that the terminating controls are correctly placed outside the tabbed pane, in the lower right.
sentences.cn: 我们还可以看到,终止控件的位置也很正确——它在标签窗格外面, 即整个对话框的右下角.

sentences.en: Oh! Well , there's a pane of glass out.
sentences.cn: 是吗! 那窗户掉了一块玻璃.

sentences.en: Outside , even through the shut window - pane, the world looked cold.
sentences.cn: 玻璃窗关得很严实, 可是朝窗外望一眼, 依然觉出外面冷得紧.

sentences.en: Rain tapped on the window - pane.
sentences.cn: 雨水轻轻地敲打在玻璃窗上.

sentences.en: Steps for creating a join manually in the Diagram pane.
sentences.cn: 在“关系图”窗格中手动创建联接的步骤.

sentences.en: Their breath bloomed the frosty pane.
sentences.cn: 他们呼出的水气,在冰冷的窗玻璃上形成一层雾.

sentences.en: Who broke this pane of glass?
sentences.cn: 是谁打破了这块窗玻璃?

words.tran_cn: 用木或玻璃板等镶嵌或装饰（panel的现在分词形式）
窗格；边；面；[建]窗格玻璃；嵌板

trans.tran_en: a piece of glass used in a window or door
